on reading compounds: 娑婆【シャバ】this world, this life, the free world (outside of prison, the army, red light district, etc.), this corrupt world, present world
娑婆気【シャバケ】worldly desires or ambitions
沙羅【シャラ】sal (tree) (Shorea robusta), saul, Japanese stewartia (Stewartia pseudocamellia)
娑羅樹【サラジュ】Japanese stewartia (Stewartia pseudocamellia), sal (tree) (Shorea robusta), saul
